Procedure.name: setupCCC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=SEC initialize=CCC receiversSetup=CCC asOn device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff setAttenuation=0,15 setAttenuation=1,5

Procedure.name: setupMMC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=SEC initialize=MMC receiversSetup=MMC asOn device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff setAttenuation=0,0 setAttenuation=1,4

Procedure.name: setupKKC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=SEC initialize=KKC receiversSetup=KKC servoSetup=KKC asOn device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff

Procedure.name: setupQQC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=SEC initialize=QQC receiversSetup=QQC asOn device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff

Procedure.name: setupXXP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=PRIM initialize=XXP receiversSetup=XXP asOn device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff

Procedure.name: setupXSP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=PRIM initialize=XXP receiversSetup=XXP asOff device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff

Procedure.name: setupLLP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=LL initialize=LLP receiversSetup=LLP asOff device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff

Procedure.name: setupSSP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=PRIM initialize=SSP receiversSetup=SSP asOff device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff

Procedure.name: setupSXP
